responses.text: Beans are the best fruit because they are the most versatile fruit. You can eat them raw, cooked, dried.

There are many reasons why beans are the best fruit. Here are some of the most popular reasons:
1. Beans are a great source of protein and fiber.
2. Beans are low in calories and fat.
3. Beans are a good source of vitamins.

Beans are the best fruit because they are packed with nutrients, including fiber, protein, and antioxidants. They are also low in calories and fat, making them a healthy choice for people who are trying to lose weight.
